title: Hiro: the Hiroshima generation
creator_credit: Gilbert Lauzun, Fuji-TV and United Nations Television
brief_description: While interviewing a Japanese student, the cameras show the diversity of Japan’s youth. Shows the clashes and the integration of foreign ideas as the young people struggle for an understanding of Japanese culture 25 years after the bomb.
